title: KarthikeyanOnline
author: KarthikeyanOnline
content: New Airdrop: PonderThe rewards: $5,000 worth of PNDR tokens ($3500 for participation and $1500 for referral rewards)For completing all tasks: $10 worth of PNDR tokensReferral: $5 worth of PNDR tokens [Max. cap of $100]Rate:      Focus:  Random participants who complete all tasks without exception will receive PNDR CoinsAirdrop Link: Airdrop Bot Join our Telegram groupFollow us on our Twitter, like and retweet the pinned tweet and tag 3 friendsSend your ERC 20 wallet addressNote: Airdrop ends on 12th November.Additional Information:Ponder is a fully integrated comparison platform that simplifies the process of comparing and choosing options for bridging, borrowing, lending, navigating NFT markets, and more within the crypto space. Website | Telegram |Twitter |  Medium | RedditDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any airdrop project, also airdrop is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving airdrop tokens. Just join airdrop for free.
